featured.text: If teachers know whether their students are left-brained or right-brained, they can help them learn better. 47.
Conversely, boys who appear to be inattentive in class may just be sitting too far away to hear the teacher.
The group was founded by a PE teacher.
Students were asked to _____ or rewrite their compositions based on the teacher’s comments.

other.text: The teacher showed ______ for the noise in the classroom and continued with his lecture as if he had not heard anything.
The boy to the teacher for his improper behavior.
A team of scientists, teachers, and students, the AmazonQuest team, recently explored some of the wonders of the Amazon Rainforest.
After graduating from college, Morrison started to work as a teacher and got married in 1958.
At the beginning of the semester, the teacher told the students that late assignments would receive a low grade as a _____.
Kevin burst into tears _____ because his teacher punished him in front of the whole class.
The conflicts between John and his teacher made it difficult for the teacher to judge his performance _____.
Recalling the group’s first tour in Europe, Camake Valaule, a physical education teacher and the founder of the Taiwu Elementary School Folk Singers, admitted that he felt very nervous.
The teacher loved to teach young students, ________ those who were smart.
To become a teacher of Physical Education.
The townspeople built a _____ in memory of the brave teacher who sacrificed her life to save her students from a burning bus.
What is the most significant implication that teachers can draw from the above information?
To encourage classroom _____, the teacher divided the class into groups and asked them to solve a problem together with their partners.
Therefore, parents and teachers should try to recognize, understand, and make use of the biological differences that make a girl a girl, and a boy a boy.

definition.zh_def: 教師；負責教育和指導學生的人。
definition.en_def: A person who educates and instructs students.
definition.example: The teacher explained the lesson clearly to the students.
